name: Hurry Santa
description:
==== Play as Santa himself and catch Christmas gifts ==

Hurry Santa is game for Christmas festival. Santa Run is a challenging game for Christmas holiday. Santa Run in this fun – filled action – packed platform game!
This free Christmas Game features 10 challenging levels, each tougher than the previous one! The rich colourful graphics and background music will keep you engaged! 

FEATURES OF HURRY SANTA GAME ARE:

= 10 challenging levels
= Awesome music and graphics
= Higher levels make it difficult to catch coins!
= Play this free Christmas Game with your friends and see who takes the least time to finish each level

=== How To Play...! ======

= Click on Icon 
= Open Main screen and Click on Play Button
= Choose level What you want to play
= Tap to play start
= Move Santa in a Screen and collect a Coin
= There are some Extra coin to Help you Get more score
= There are some Bomb to make destroy Santa


SoftHealer Team Wishing Merry Christmas To All!
